content: As a required boss, you can't miss running into Lingxuzi, as he guards the Guanyin Temple at the far edge of the Forest of Wolves. You can find the temple by heading along the path straight from the Outside the Forest Shrine, across a small bridge and past the Wandering Wight to a small tunnel.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Lingxuzi.md', within the main section titled 'Lingxuzi', specifically from the subsection 'Where to Find Lingxuzi'.
The content is as follows:
As a required boss, you can't miss running into Lingxuzi, as he guards the Guanyin Temple at the far edge of the Forest of Wolves. You can find the temple by heading along the path straight from the Outside the Forest Shrine, across a small bridge and past the Wandering Wight to a small tunnel.
